entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
